description: Erection of two portacabins, car wash building, advertising flags and car parking for car/van rental facility. (OBSERVATIONS TO L.B. CAMDEN). APPLICANTS PLAN NOS.: London Borough of Camden Reg. No.                       9501728
decision_conditions:
Observations to London Borough of Camden 

 (1) London Borough of Islington has concerns about the vehicular entry/exit to the site. The Council would object to the proposal if it involves any new vehicular access from York Way opposite the junction with Copenhagen Street, but has no objections to the proposal if the main vehicular access is on Goods Way as existing. 

 (2) The existing boundary wall and railings along York Way should be retained. 

 (3) Subject to (1) above being acceptable, London Borough of Islington would prefer a less obtrusive and simpler advertising sign.
